altTitles.ja: ルックス天才

description.en:
One day, I suddenly gained the ability to transform into a game character! 
With these abilities and appearances under my belt, I can now become a "face genius" whenever I want!
description.ko:
어느 날 갑자기 게임 캐릭터로 변신하는 능력이 생겼다!
그 스킬과, 그 모습이 모두 내 것이다.
나는 이제 언제든 "얼굴천재"가 된다!
description.ru: У меня нет друзей и девушки, а моя семья очень бедная. Но однажды меня бьёт током, и я превращаюсь в лекаря-красавчика из игры! И, кажется, у меня появились невероятные способности! Скоро моя жизнь изменится!
description.th: ใบหน้าที่แม้แต่เด็กที่กำลังร้องไห้ยังต้องหยุดร้อง ตั้งแต่หัวจรดเท้าที่ทุกสายตาต่างจับจ้องแม้อยู่ท่ามกลางสายฝน ผู้ชายที่ทำให้ความเร่งรีบบนท้องถนนหยุดซะงักเสมอ คนคนนั้นก็คือผม จอนจีอุง
description.zh:
平凡少年偶获捏脸能力！
小透明惊变绝世大帅哥！
平凡少年全志雄意外被电击后竟拥有了可以变身为游戏人物的能力。并且变身后可以拥有该人物的技能和长相。他还可以随时随地的进行变化。默默无闻的他突然变成人见人爱，车见车爆胎的大帅哥，整个生活也因此发生了改变...但还有什么考验在等待着志雄呢？
description.zh-hk: 某一天， 我突然有了變成遊戲人物的能力！ 擁有了那些技能跟外表。我現在不管何時都能成為「臉蛋天才」！

altTitles.ja: サカモト デイズ カラー版

description.en: Taro Sakamoto was the ultimate assassin, feared by villains and admired by hitmen. But one day…he fell in love! Retirement, marriage, fatherhood and then… Sakamoto gained weight! The chubby guy who runs the neighborhood store is actually a former legendary hitman! Can he protect his family from danger? Get ready to experience a new kind of action comedy series!

title.en: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?

altTitles.de: Meine neue Freundin ist kein Mensch?

altTitles.fr: Ma Nouvelle Copine N'est Pas Humaine ?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha nova namorada não é humana?

altTitles.tr: Yeni kız arkadaşım insan değil mi?

altTitles.pl: Moja nowa dziewczyna nie jest człowiekiem?

altTitles.ja: ナインピークス NINE PEAKS

description.en:
After just starting at his new school, Mashio Gaku is suspended within a week for getting into a scuffle with a third year. After returning home to his disapproving dad's okonomiyaki joint, his father, Mashio Harumi, can't help but reprimand him and refuses to serve him. Their harsh words are the last exchange they share before an unfortunate traffic accident takes Harumi's life.

At his father's wake, Gaku finds out he was, in his words, a big fuckin' deal. In mourning, Gaku heads out to fish like him and his father always would, only to hook a big catch and get pulled into the water... When he comes to, he finds himself staring a familiar stranger in the face... **in the year 2000.**
description.ja: 真汐樂(ましおがく)は父と2人暮らしの高校1年生。入学早々上級生と乱闘騒ぎを起こし停学処分となった矢先、突然の事故で父を亡くす。父の通夜の晩に、父との思い出である堤防釣りに出かけた樂は、海に落ち22年前にタイムリープしてしまう。そして樂を海から助けたのは、他ならぬ自分と同い年の父・春実だった。春実の両親(樂の祖父母)に気に入られた樂は、宮城樂として真汐家に居候することに。そして、祖父のはからいで父と同じ青波高校に通うことになる。22年前の玖嶺の街は不良だらけ。樂は父と2人でこの街の頂点を目指す!!
description.ru: Душещипательная история о взаимоотношениях отца и сына. Главный герой — Масио Гаку, не особо ладит со своим отцом. После ссоры с сыном, Масио Харуми умирает... Гаку даже подумать не мог, что с его отцом, не особо общительным человеком, придёт проститься так много людей. Вскоре Гаку решает пойти на рыбалку где по случайности падает в море, но сразу же выбирается с помощью какого-то странного человека... Этим незнакомцем оказался его отец, ровно в 2000 году! Теперь Гаку начинает помогать Харуми, своему отцу, добиться статуса лидера города и разобраться что же здесь происходит...
description.vi: Sau cái chết của cha, Mashio Gaku biết được một sự thật động trời: Cha cậu từng là gã du côn mạnh nhất thành phố. Thế rồi một biến cố bất ngờ xảy ra, đưa cậu trở về quá khứ 22 năm trước, khi cha cậu bằng tuổi cậu...

altTitles.ja: チーズ・イン・ザ・トラップ

description.en: Having returned to college after a year long break, Hong Sul, a hard-working over-achiever, inadvertently got on the wrong side of a suspiciously perfect senior named Yoo Jung. From then on, her life took a turn for the worse - and Sul was almost certain it was all Jung's doing. So why is he suddenly acting so friendly a year later?

description.en:
After overcoming the threat of Acnologia and Zeref, Fairy Tail has become stronger and more energetic! The 100 year quest which Natsu and company left for, and also to the members who had remained at the guild, something new is going to happen!? Although the story was supposed to have concluded, a new adventure now begins!

description.ru: Продолжение популярной манги "Хвост Феи" или "Фейри Тейл", которая будет носить отдельное название "100 летний квест"! После победы над Зерефом нашу любимую, еще более сильную гильдию, ждет новое приключение! Не пропустите новые приключения популярных героев!

description.en: I worked as a manhua artist, then died from pulling an all-nighter. I woke up as the villainess "Emi Morwen" from my webcomic! Emi was an alluring yet cruel character who departed from the story by ending her own life. However, I’m not the real Emi!

description.en:
Gotou, a virgin high school boy, has a crush on his affectionate gal classmate, Agawa. But one day after school, he catches Agawa having sex with Takayama in an empty classroom. Gotou is devastated, but he soon learns that not only did she have sex with Takayama, Agawa is a slut who'll have sex with anyone who asks. Even…‽
___
**Note:** After the release of Chapter 35, author Takeda Super decided to take the story in a new, different direction, so Chapters 31–35 were retconned and new chapters were drawn. However, for fans that enjoyed the original timeline, the old chapters were later compiled into [their own volume](https://mangadex.org/title/b782186f-60d9-4f6c-b050-7b21013040ff) that even included an additional chapter in that timeline.

**Alternative Official Raws:**
- [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/4856001361135826437)
- [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/4856001361243117705)

description.vi: Con đũy tình yêu đã dẫn nam chính của ta đi thích một gyaru lẳng lơ sẵn sàng làm nháy với bất cứ ai. Rồi anh main sẽ làm gì trước cái tình huống NTR nhưng không hẳn này? Khuyến cáo ko dành cho trẻ dưới 18 và các thanh niên không thích NTR. Đọc truyện này đừng lắp đầu trên vào làm gì (lắp đầu dưới thì OK).

description.pt-br: Uma Gal safada que deixa todo mundo transar com ela e um garoto virgem do ensino médio apaixonado por ela, mesmo depois de vê-la transar com seu colega de classe.

description.de:
Damals hatte Dokja noch überhaupt keine Ahnung. Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. Jetzt begibt sich Dokja auf eine Reise, um den Lauf der Geschichte zu ändern und die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

description.ja:
「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

title.en: I Don't Feel Like Doing Anything

altTitles.en: I Don't Want To Do Anything

description.en:
One spring day, after the recent death of her mother, Summer decides to quit her stressful city job. She moves to a small beachside town, where she plans to use her entire life savings on two years of doing absolutely nothing. She calculates that she can subsist for this long without finding a job by leading a minimalist, free life. She finds peace and makes friends in her new environment But after a while, the walls of her home are repeatedly vandalized with death threats. Will Summer be able to catch the villain, find normalcy in her life, and make peace with herself?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=4998319)
description.ko:
26살의 봄, 오늘부터 아무것도 하지 않기로 결심했다

엄마가 그랬다. 
손해 보고 사는 게 편하다고.

엄마 말이 맞다.
그래, 손해 보고 살자.

단, 호구 잡히지 않을 정도만.

이여름, 26세 봄
오늘 회사를 그만뒀다.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=4998319)

title.en: Akuma wa Rozario ni Kiss o suru

altTitles.ja: 悪魔はロザリオにキスをする

altTitles.vi: Lên Chuỗi Tràng Hạt, Ác Ma đặt Nụ Hôn

description.en:
Since his childhood, Yoshihiro Yoshinaga has faced countless challenges, distancing himself from the company of others and the possibility of forging friendships due to a persistent problem: being harassed by spirits from an early age.

This constant spectral presence has cast shadows over his life, weaving a web of misfortunes. However, the course of his life takes a drastic turn when a giant demon unexpectedly emerges intent on taking his life. In the midst of this crisis, a chance encounter with Alicia Baal, a beautiful nun residing within a church, becomes the catalyst for a radical transformation to his destiny.
description.ja: 幸彦は幽霊が見えたが、その実態は悪魔だった。ある日、本物の悪魔に遭遇。逃げた先の教会でシスター・アリシアと出会い、悪魔退治の契約を交わす。しかし彼女の正体は、魔王になることを企む「悪魔」だった――！

altTitles.ja: 悪党たちに育てられてます！

altTitles.pt-br: Eu Estou Sendo Criada por Vilões

description.en:
I thought I was an illegitimate child… but it turns out that I was a complete stranger?!

A year after transmigrating as an extra, I found out that I was on the verge of being kicked out.

I said I’d rather leave the house on my own.

“Actually, this child is my daughter. Right, daughter?”

Did I catch the attention of the psychopathic duke?

‘I heard that the money he gave after playing with someone was enough to buy an island?’

I got along with him as his daughter because I thought I could get his fortune later on. And a few months later, I would leave his house with a thick bank account.

“Stay by my side until I tell you to leave.”

However, my dad, who regarded me as a toy, came looking for me and held me back.

=

After returning home due to dad’s persuasion, the families and my dad fought to adopt me. My uncles and aunts gathered to protect me, and future psychos began to have strange obsessions over me.

“Happy Birthday, Ayrin. You’re the head as of today.”

On top of that, the duke’s position was my birthday present.
Everything is going just as I expected.

[Hey, how long are you going to sleep? Grandma said she is gonna take you off life support!]
[Cha Miso, you’re going to die!]

What is that voice?
Will I be okay like this? (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)
description.tr: Gayrimeşru bir çocuk olduğumu sanıyordum… ama tamamen yabancı olduğum ortaya çıktı?! Yan karakter olarak beden değiştirdikten bir yıl sonra kovulmanın eşiğinde olduğumu öğrendim. Evden tek başıma çıkmayı tercih ederim dedim. “Aslında bu çocuk benim kızım. Değil mi kızım?” Psikopat dükün dikkatini mi çektim ? "Biriyle oynadıktan sonra verdiği paranın bir ada almaya yettiğini duydum?" Onunla kızı olarak iyi anlaştım çünkü daha sonra servetini ele geçirebileceğimi düşündüm ve birkaç ay sonra onun evinden kalın bir banka hesabıyla ayrılmayı planladım. "Sana gitmeni söyleyene kadar yanımda kal." Ancak beni oyuncak gibi gören babam beni aramaya geldi ve beni tuttu. *** Babamın iknasıyla eve döndükten sonra aileler ve babam beni evlat edinmek için mücadele etti. Amcalarım ve teyzelerim beni korumak için toplandılar ve geleceğin psikopatları bana karşı garip saplantılar beslemeye başladılar. "Doğum günün kutlu olsun Ayrin. Bugün itibariyle başkan sensin.” Üstelik Dük'ün konumu benim doğum günü hediyemdi. Her şey beklediğim gibi gidiyor. [Hey, daha ne kadar uyuyacaksın? Büyükanne sana tutucunu çıkarmanı söyledi!] [Cha Miso, öleceksin!] Bu ses nedir? Böyle iyi olacak mıyım?
description.pt-br: Negligenciada por sua família, Cha Miso sonha em viver em seu romance favorito como a amada personagem principal. Então, um dia, ela acorda dentro do romance, mas como Eiryn Etam, uma personagem secundária oprimida que será expulsa de sua casa! Para evitar mais negligência, ela planeja ir embora antes que isso aconteça. Mas quando Erno Etam, o herdeiro maluco da Casa Etam, afirma que Eiryn é sua filha, seus planos são frustrados e Eiryn se vê no meio de um conflito entre a Casa Etam e um elenco de vilões.

altTitles.ja: 大人になれない僕らは

altTitles.es-la: Nosotros que no podemos convertirnos en adultos

description.en:
The latest work from the author of "The Diary of a Commuting Student". It's a silly and endless story about how some kids kill time by repeating the 7th of July every day. A time-loop love story of two high school students trapped in "Eternal Youth"!

(Source: Young Magazine)
description.es-la: ¡El último trabajo de Jo Fujita en Commuting Student Diary! Esta es nuestra tonta e interminable historia de cómo matamos el tiempo una y otra vez el 7 de julio. ¡Una historia de amor en bucle temporal de dos estudiantes de preparatoria atrapados en una "eterna juventud"!

altTitles.ja: 追放令嬢は技能実習生になりました。〜アーシャ様は野菜畑から逃げ出したい〜

altTitles.ko: 추방영애는 기능실습생이 되었습니다. ~아샤 님은 야채밭에서 도망치고 싶어~

altTitles.th: ฮานะมารุ อนุบาลเด็กดีนะจะบอกให้

altTitles.ja: はなまる幼稚園

description.en: Anzu goes to a preschool with her friends, the shy Koume and the eccentric Hiiragi. Together, they try to gain Anzu attention from their male caretaker Tsuchida, though he is clearly more interested in the pretty Yamamoto who supervises the class next door.
description.pt-br:
Anzu é uma criança do jardim de infância com uma grande paixão por seu professor Tsuchida, mas Tsuchida claramente prefere Yamamoto, uma jovem professora que lida com a classe ao lado, e Anzu tem suas duas amigas para ajudá-la: a tímida Koume e a excêntrica Hiiragi.

NOTA: Hanamaru é o equivalente à estrela de ouro concedida para as crianças por um bom trabalho na escolas.

altTitles.ja: 世話やきキツネの仙狐さん

description.en:
Like many hardworking members of the workforce, Kuroto Nakano is perpetually stressed out by his job. Still, since he lives alone, he must carry on to sustain himself. Little do humans like Kuroto know, this stress takes the form of darkness residing within a person's body and will bring one's life to ruin.  
Fox deities can see this darkness and have the duty to save people before it is too late. To help rid Kuroto of his stress, Senko-san, an eight hundred-year-old foxgirl, volunteers to take care of him, and will do everything she can to ease the tension in his weary soul.

---

**Notes:**
- Despite initial serialization ending by November 2022, Comic Newtype announced on 9 February 2023 that the series would later resume publication.
description.ru: В повседневную жизнь Накано, работающего на «чёрную компанию», внезапно вторглась кицунэ Сэнко-сан (молодая жена 800 лет от роду). Будь то готовка, уборка или «особая забота» (чем бы это ни было), она исцелит его истощение своей нежной «заботой».
description.vi: Kuroto Nakano là một nhân viên văn phòng trẻ tuổi có cuộc sống vô cùng bận rộn và căng thẳng, gần như dành toàn bộ thời gian trong ngày ở công ti. Một đêm nọ, sau ngày dài làm việc quá sức, anh mở cửa nhà và thấy một cô gái với tai và đuôi cáo đang nấu cơm trong bếp. Tên cô là Senko, một hồ li 800 tuổi. Senko đã từ thế giới tâm linh hạ phàm để giúp Nakano xua tan căng thẳng và tìm lại hạnh phúc.
description.es-la: La vida cotidiana de Nanako, un hombre asalariado que trabaja en una compañía que lo explota, es repentinamente invadido por la Kitsune, Senko-san (800 años de edad- esposa joven). Ya sea cocina, limpieza o un servicio especial... Ella curará su agotamiento con su tierno cuidado.

altTitles.ja: ワンピース

description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
description.es: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.ru: Последние слова, произнесённые Королем Пиратов Гол Д. Роджером перед казнью, вдохновили многих выйти в море: «Мои сокровища? Я завещаю их тому, кто сможет их найти. Ищите! Я все оставил в одном месте!». Лишённые сна и покоя люди ринулись на Гранд Лайн, самое опасное место в мире. Так началась великая эра пиратов… Но с каждым годом романтиков становилось все меньше, их постепенно вытесняли прагматичные пираты-разбойники, которым награбленное добро было куда ближе, чем какие-то «никчёмные мечты». Но вот, одним прекрасным днем, семнадцатилетний Монки Д. Луффи исполнил заветную мечту детства - отправился в море. Его цель — ни много, ни мало стать новым Королём Пиратов. За достаточно короткий срок юному капитану удаётся собрать команду, состоящую из не менее амбициозных искателей приключений. И пусть ими движут совершенно разные устремления, главное, этим ребятам важны не столько деньги и слава, сколько куда более ценное – принципы и верность друзьям. И ещё – служение Мечте. Что же, пока по Гранд Лайн плавают такие люди, Великая Эра Пиратов всегда будет с нами!
description.uk:
Король піратів Ґолд Роджер буде страчений Світовим урядом. Прямо перед смертю він підтвердив існування великого скарбу «Ван Піс», який знаходиться десь на величезному морі Ґранд Лайн. Як тільки Роджер сказав, що будь-хто гідний досягти Ван Пісу може забрати його собі, його стратили, і почалася Велика ера піратів.

Двадцять два роки потому, молодий хлопець на ім’я Монкі Д. Луффі готовий почати свою пригоду по пошуку Ван Пісу та здобуванню титулу Короля піратів. Маючи при собі солом’яну шапку, невеличкий човен та еластичне тіло, він вирушає у неймовірну подорож, щоб зібрати собі команду та хороший корабель, який зможе пронести їх через весь Ґранд Лайн, щоб стати найвеличнішими в усіх морях.
description.es-la: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.pt-br: One Piece começa quando Gol D. Roger, o Rei Dos Piratas que possuiu tudo nesse mundo, antes de ser executado, diz que escondeu o seu tesouro em algum lugar da Grand Line, um oceano extremamente perigoso. Desde então muitos piratas se aventuram pela Grand Line para tentar encontrar o tesouro chamado One Piece. Um deles é Monkey D. Luffy, o garoto que, acidentalmente, comeu uma das Akuma No Mi, a Gomu Gomu No Mi (Fruta da Borracha), e agora ele pode esticar seu corpo como se fosse uma borracha. A jornada dele começa atrás de companheiros e um barco, que ele vai conseguindo pouco a pouco, pois tem um objetivo: Ser o Rei Dos Piratas!!

altTitles.ja: けもみみみこさん
魔性の乙女の役廻り

altTitles.en: The Role of the Femme Fatale

description.en: Kairan Girls' Academy. A boarding school rich with history and tradition, attended only by orphans. It has a special system in which students are given "roles" that align with their individual goals. Hanako Shimura, a kind-hearted girl filled with dreams and expectations, enrolls into the academy hoping to make friends with everyone at school. But will she be able to?
description.ja: 私立廻蘭女学院中学。そこは孤児院出身の子どもたちのみが通う、歴史と伝統ある寄宿学校。この学校には古くから、生徒たちへ個々の目標に沿った【役柄】を与えるという特殊な制度があった。心優しい少女・志村花子は「学校中のみんなと友達になる」ことを目標に入学すると、いきなりとんでもない課題を与えられてしまい――！？クセ強めなクラスメイトたちに囲まれて「愛人作り」はできるのか！？

altTitles.en: The Chaotic God of Extraordinary Strength

altTitles.es-la: El Dios Caótico de Fuerza Extraordinaria

description.en: All Jeong wants is a second chance -- for revenge! His grandfather’s gruesome death has transformed him into the bloodthirsty and ruthless Scythe Demon. He will stop at nothing until he has killed the man responsible. Yet rage and determination alone are not enough. He must train in martial arts if he ever wants to stand a chance against such a formidable foe. Will he succeed in his revenge on the murderer of his grandfather?
description.pt-br: Jeong, o Demônio da Foice Assassina, se regozija com a morte de outras pessoas. Acontece que ele se parece com Mok Gyeongwoon, o terceiro jovem mestre da Mansão da Espada Mok… “Se fingir ser eu e viver minha vida, deixarei você sair desta prisão.” “Você realmente vai me dar essa chance?” Mate o terceiro jovem mestre e viva fingindo ser ele. O falso Mok Gyeongwoon sobreviverá a esta vida? O assassino em série começa sua nova jornada como o terceiro jovem mestre da grande mansão da Espada Mok.

title.en: Magical Explorer - Reborn as a Side Character in a Fantasy Dating Sim

altTitles.ja: マジカル★エクスプローラー エロゲの友人キャラに転生したけど、ゲーム知識使って自由に生きる

altTitles.en: Magical★Explorer - Reborn as a Eroge Hero's Friend, I'll Live Freely with my Eroge Knowledge

altTitles.ru: Переродившись в друга главного героя эроге, я буду жить свободно, используя мои знания эроге

altTitles.en: Magical★Explorer - I was reincarnated as a friend character in an eroge, but I use my knowledge of the game to live freely.
Magical★Explorer It seems I have become a Friend of the Protagonist in an Eroge World, but because Magic is fun I have abandoned the role and train myself.

altTitles.ja-ro: Magical★Explorer - Eroge no Yuujin Kyara ni Tensei Shitakedo, Game Chishiki Tsukatte Jiyuu ni Ikiru

description.en: There’s a legendary Bishoujo Game that has become popular among Japanese gentlemen. Its name is “ Magical★Explorer” or Magiero for short. The game’s protagonist has a cheat-like power with 12 different beautiful heroines to flirt with, including additional 12 heroines from the DLC, a harem of 24 beauties. I have become that protagonist!………………Not. Instead, I have become the third-wheel character who always laughing like an idiot next to him. There’s no heroine that would lay their eyes on me.    But now I couldn’t care less about the protagonist and his heroines. Why? Because I discovered magic. While I was using it, I have become interested in it. I want to master it. I want to become the strongest. Thus I have decided. I would abandon half my role as a protagonist’s friend to train my magic and then I would beat the hell out of that cheat who can solo the Demon King.    ………..I was training with that thought in mind, but somehow I keep getting closer to the heroines and furthermore, I don’t know why I keep encounter events like I am some Eroge’s protagonist.
description.ja: 伝説の美少女ゲーム『マジカル★エクスプローラー』。俺はこのゲームでチートなスキルを持つモテモテの主人公！……の横でへらへらと笑う不遇な友人キャラに転生していた…！？

altTitles.ja: ポケットモンスター リバースト
ポケットモンスターRéBURST

description.en: The story begins with the protagonist leaving his town where people and Pokémon live in peace together in order to locate his father. The hero doesn’t know much about his father besides the fact that he is a powerful swordsman. On his journey, the protagonist meets up with new friends and foes and discovers the power of Burst Heart Crystals, these crystals entrap a Pokémon inside and allow humans transform themselves partly into them in order to take advantage of their special abilities and attacks.

altTitles.ar: BE BLUES! ~นักเตะเลือดซามูไร~

altTitles.ja: BE BLUES!～青になれ～
ビーブルーズ!　〜あおになれ〜

description.en:
If you're born in Japan and you play football, you'll eventually want to wear the national team uniform! It's the same for everyone! Ichijou Ryuu is a boy whose dream is to become a Japan national team player. With his twin childhood friends, Yuuto and Yuki, their first goal is to win the Japan Under-12 Football Championship!  
The excitement of a one-on-one! The tension in front of goal! The elation from pulling off the perfect link up play! The essence of what makes football enjoyable is here.  
  
Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Best Shonen Manga in 2014.  


---
description.ru: Рию Ичиджо мальчик, которые мечтает попасть в национальную команду по футболу. Вместе со своими друзьями, братьями-близнецами Юто и Юки, он сначала стремится выиграть в национальном чемпионате младшей лиги. В начальной школе его сбивает машина, когда он защищает от неё своего друга. Попав в больницу на 2 года, Рию преодолевает жёсткую реабилитацию. И вот он поступает в старшую школу и присоединяется к школьной футбольной команде. На тренировках не жалеет себя, хотя травмы напоминают о себе. Сможет ли он попасть в команду мечты или он должен быть обычным школьником?
description.vi:
Ichijou Ryu là một cậu bé mang trong mình ước mơ được khoác lên mình màu áo của đội tuyển quốc gia Nhật Bản. Cùng với hai người bạn từ thuở thiếu thời của mình là cặp song sinh Yuto và Yuki, cả ba người đều hạ quyết tâm thực hiện cho bằng được mục tiêu đó của Ichijou Ryu. Trên chuyến hành trình của mình, Ichijou Ryu đã gặp phải những khó khăn nhưng cậu vẫn không nản chí mà vẫn tiếp tục bước đi. Một bộ manga cực hay về bóng đá và những nhân vật dành hết niềm đam mê vào nó.  


---

description.ar: تسو تيانشين هو آخر إنسان حي في مدينة مليئة بالزومبي. فقط عندما كان متأكداً من أنه مات ، يجد روحه تعود إلى ما قبل ذلك اليوم المشؤوم قبل عشر سنوات. يقسم أنه سوف يحمي الناس المهمين له هذه المرة ويجتمع مع عشيقته. تابعوا نضاله من أجل البقاء بمساعدة ذكرياته للسنوات العشر القادمة!
description.en: Zuo Tianchen is the last living human in a mutated zombie-infested city. Just when he was sure he'd died, he finds his soul returned to just before that ill-fated day ten years ago. He swears he'll protect the people important to him this time round and reunite with his past lover. Watch his struggles to survive equipped with his memory of the next ten years!
description.fr: uo Tianchen est l'un des derniers survivants sur terre depuis qu'une épidémie venant de l'espace s'était abattue sur terre, il l'y a de cela 10 ans. Alors qu'il est sur le point de mourir, Zuo fît donc ses adieux à sa petite amie qu'il avait rencontré durant l'épidémie. C'est alors que, d'un coup, alors qu'il était sur le point de mourir, il retourna dans le temps 10 ans auparavant, quelques heures avant le début de l'épidémie. C'est alors qu'il décida de sauver son meilleur ami qui avait périt dès le début de l'épidémie, 10 ans auparavant, et c'est alors qu'il se met à la recherche de sa copine qu'il avait dans l'ancienne apocalypse.
description.ru:
Зе Тянчен – последний выживший человек в городе, зараженном зомби-инфекцией. Будучи на грани смерти, он внезапно оказался в своем теле десять лет назад, когда город еще не был заражен. Он решил, что в этот раз спасет близких ему людей и воссоединится со своей старой любовью.   
  
Следите за его приключениями, в которых он использует свои воспоминания о следующих 10 годах, чтобы выжить и спасти своих близких!

title.en: Inaho-kun wa Nise Kanojo no Hazu na no ni

altTitles.ja: 稲穂くんは偽カノジョのはずなのに

altTitles.ja-ro: Inaho-kun Wa Nise Kanojou No Hazu Nanoni

altTitles.en: Inaho-kun Is Supposed to Be a Fake Sweetheart

description.en:
Mori Shintaro, a new first-year student, yearns for the sparkling high school life of having a girlfriend and experiencing youth, but is ridiculed by those around him. His classmate, Inaho Sawatari, entered the school as the top student and is a highly regarded beauty. The two are not supposed to cross paths, but after an incident where they are mistaken for a couple, Inaho makes an unexpected proposal:
"Shall we pretend that we're really dating?"

---
**Notes:**
- The pre-serialization series is [Houkago no Cinderella-kun](https://mangadex.org/title/147b8fd6-5232-45df-993f-35c908cf41a2/houkago-no-cinderella-kun).

title.en: Danshi Kokoseidakedo Gyaru ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 男子高校生だけどギャルにTSしました

altTitles.ja-ro: Danshi Koukousei Dakedo Gal ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.en: I'm a High School Boy, but I Got Gender-Swapped into a Gyaru

altTitles.pt-br: Eu sou um Garoto do Ensino médio, mas troquei de Gênero e Me Tornei uma Gal

description.en:
Junpei, a loner high schooler, became a gyaru after saving the god of gyaru from drowning. Through his mother's connections, he was able to transfer to an all-girls school, but it was stuffed to the brim with gyarus! Every day is a sensory overload for Shunpei, who's never even talked to a girl, let alone a gyaru.
___
 [Alternative Official Raw (NicoNico)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67976)
description.ja: 陰キャ男子・桜井は、目の前で溺れていたギャル神様を助けた恩恵でギャルになってしまった。母親の伝手で転校することができたが、その学校はギャルだらけの女子校だった！ギャルどころか女子とまともに交流したことがない桜井にとって刺激が強すぎる毎日…。
description.pt-br:
Shunpei, um estudante solitário do ensino médio, se tornou uma gal depois de salvar a deusa das gals de se afogar. Através das conexões de sua mãe, ele conseguiu transferir-se para uma escola só para meninas, mas estava cheia de gals!
 Todos os dias são uma sobrecarga sensorial para Shunpei, que nunca falou com uma garota, muito menos com uma gal.
 
 É o início de uma comédia escolar engraçada, com um cara introvertido do ensino médio => transformado em Gal.

altTitles.ja: 白い砂のアクアトープ

description.en: Gama Gama Aquarium, a small aquarium in Okinawa, is an hour's bus ride from Naha. Kukuru Misakino is an 18-year-old high school student who works there, and she knows about the "secret" of the aquarium: sometimes you can see mysterious things. One day Kukuru meets Fuuka, standing in front of a water tank with flowing hair and a tear rolling down her cheek. Fuuka has given up on her dream of becoming an idol and she has run away from Tokyo to Okinawa. Wanting to find a place to belong, Fuuka earnestly asks to work at the aquarium. The manga follows Kukuru and Fuuka as they deal with the issues of the secret of the aquarium and a looming crisis of its possible closure.

title.en: Yabai Aidoru no Manager ni Nacchatta Hanashi

altTitles.ja: やばいアイドルのマネージャーになっちゃった話

description.en: Reluctantly becoming a manager, I was assigned to my first role managing the super popular idol, "Maron," who has a hidden side... On stage, Maron shines brightly, but in her private life, she's a caring but strange girl who can't give up smoking and requires a lot of attention. As her manager, I have to support her and keep the true face of this "perfect idol" hidden!
description.ja:
仕方なくマネージャーになって、
初めて担当する大人気アイドル「まろん」には
裏の顔があった...。

舞台上でキラキラしているまろんだが、
私生活ではタバコが手放せない、世話の焼ける変わった女の子。
「完璧なアイドル」まろんの素顔を隠し通すために、
マネージャーとしてサポートしなければ！

裏ありアイドル×世話好きマネージャー
喫煙所から始まる、二人の物語ーー。

description.en:
(In a made-up dynasty) During the Chen dynasty, Consort Jing gave birth to a pair of fraternal twins under the rays of sunlight. The prince was born with a cinnabar mole between his eyebrows, while the princess was born with six fingers.

Fortune and misfortune appeared at the same time, causing the twins to experience entirely different fates as they were forced to leave their family. The heavenly tribulation is approaching, will the two twins who were separated from birth ever get to be reunited? What methods would they use to fight against their destinies?

---

**Note:** This is the **page style** version of [Song of the Sky Pacers](https://mangadex.org/title/7226ef70-592f-42b5-a3ff-8b91af15d97f)
description.zh: （架空朝代）大陈年间，菁贵妃霞光中诞下双生龙凤胎。皇子生来眉间一颗朱砂痣，皇女天生六指 。祥瑞与不祥同时出现，令同胞双生的二人迎来截然不同的命运，被迫与至亲分离。天劫将至，自出生便相离的他们是否能重逢？彼此又以何种方式与天命相争？

title.en: Uma Musume Pretty Derby: Star Blossom

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘 プリティーダービー スターブロッサム

description.en:
The popular cross-media content "Uma Musume Pretty Derby" features "Uma Musume" who have inherited the names and souls of numerous racehorses! A new legend begins with the indomitable horse girl "Sakura Laurel" as the main character.

---

- [Alternative Raw](https://shonenjumpplus.com/episode/4856001361118480104)
description.ja: 「挑戦なくして、得られるものなど何もない」　見習いトレーナー・椿が出会ったのは、ガラスの脚を抱えたデビュー前のウマ娘・サクラローレル。半人前の2人が見た頂点への夢は、無謀なのか――。

title.en: Class no Gal ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu

altTitles.ja: クラスのギャルに空気扱いされています

altTitles.ja-ro: Kurasu no Gyaru ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu

altTitles.en: The Gals in My Class Treat Me Like Air

altTitles.id: Aku Dianggap Seolah-olah Udara Oleh Gadis Gyaru Di Kelas

altTitles.es-la: Las chicas de mi clase me tratan como el aire

altTitles.vi: Mấy nhỏ Gyaru trong lớp tôi đối xử tôi như không khí

altTitles.ja: 愛乃ななの計画 クラスのギャルに空気扱いされています

altTitles.ja-ro: Aino Nana no Keikaku: Class no Gal ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu

altTitles.en: Nana Aino's Plan: The Gals in My Class Treat Me Like Air

description.en:
A boy named Ryuuji Aizawa is getting treated by his gyaru classmates like he wasn't there, like this girl named Nana Aino who sits on his seat. With him still in it.

---

Note: 
Released as a free ebook compilation on Amazon under the title: *Aino Nana no Keikaku: Class no Gal ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu (愛乃ななの計画 クラスのギャルに空気扱いされています)* "Nana Aino's Plan: The Gals in My Class Treat Me Like Air"; Volume 1 contains chapters 1-24 including some new textless illustrations.

* Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Tranquillity650/status/1721818260436644142)
description.es-la: Un par de gals parecen no notar al chico delante de ellas.

altTitles.ja: カグラバチ

description.cs: Mladý Chihiro tráví dny tréninkem pod vedením svého slavného otce kováře. Doufá, že jednoho dne sám stane slavným kovářem mečů. Praštěný otec a vážný syn – mysleli si, že tyto dny budou trvat věčně. Najednou však dojde k tragédii. Temný den plný krve. Chihiro a jeho čepel nyní žijí jen pro pomstu. Epická bitevní akce s katanou!
description.en: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge.
description.he: צ'יהירו הצעיר מבלה את ימיו באימונים תחת הדרכתו של אביו, מחשל החרבות המפורסם. יום אחד, הוא מקווה להפוך בעצמו ליצרן חרבות דגול. האב המשעשע והבן הרציני--הם חשבו שהימים האלו יימשכו לנצח. אבל לפתע, הטרגדיה מכה. יום אפל ספוג בדם. צ'יהירו וחרבו חיים כעת רק למען הנקמה.
description.ja: 刀匠を志す少年チヒロは、父の下で日々修行に励んでいた。おちゃらけた父と寡黙な息子。笑いの絶えない毎日がいつまでも続くと思っていたが…ある日悲劇が訪れる…。血塗られた絆と帰らない日常。少年は憎しみを焚べ、決意の炎を心に宿す…。
description.ru: Юный Тихиро проводит дни, тренируясь под руководством своего знаменитого отца-мечника, который издавна изготавливает катаны для начала и конца войн. Однажды Тихиро надеется сам стать великим мастером мечей. Легкомысленный отец и серьезный сын — они думали, что эти спокойные дни будут длиться вечно. Но внезапно случается трагедия. Темный день, пропитанный кровью. Тихиро и его клинок теперь живут только ради мести...
description.tr: Genç Chihiro günlerini ünlü kılıç ustası babasının yanında eğitim alarak geçirmektedir. Bir gün kendisi de büyük bir kılıç ustası olmayı ummaktadır. Şapşal baba ve ciddi oğul, bugünlerin sonsuza dek süreceğini düşünmektedirler. Ama aniden bir trajedi yaşanır. Kana bulanmış karanlık bir gün. Chihiro ve kılıcı artık sadece intikam için yaşamaktadır. Destansı kılıç savaşı aksiyonu!
description.pt-br: O jovem Chihiro passa seus dias treinando com seu famoso pai ferreiro. Um dia ele espera se tornar um grande fabricante de espadas. O pai bobo e o filho sério – eles pensavam que esses dias durariam para sempre. Mas de repente, a tragédia acontece. Um dia escuro, encharcado de sangue. Chihiro e sua lâmina agora vivem apenas para vingança. Ação épica de batalha de espadas!

altTitles.ja: 30MS AROUND!

description.en:
"30MS 4-panel comic begins!"
Enjoy the relaxed everyday life of the sisters ✨

Official 4Koma posted on the 30 Minutes Sisters Twitter: https://x.com/30msisters
Also available on the Bandai Hobby Site: https://bandai-hobby.net/site/30minutes_sisters/extra/around/

altTitles.ja: キーチ!!

description.en: Left to himself at an early age in the slummiest parts of today’s Japan, Kiichi learns how to survive on his own. As a teenager, how can he adapt to a society whose rules he rejects? Unless he creates his own rules… Kiichi, a raw icon of strength and integrity, stands alone against the world’s injustice and becomes an unforgettable character.
description.pt-br: Deixado a si mesmo desde cedo nas partes mais pobres do Japão de hoje, Kiichi aprende como sobreviver por conta própria. Na adolescência, como ele pode se adaptar a uma sociedade cujas regras ele rejeita? A menos que ele crie suas próprias regras... Kiichi, um ícone bruto de força e integridade, se coloca sozinho contra a injustiça do mundo e se torna um personagem inesquecível.

title.en: The Time-Limited Baby Doctor Doesn't Hide Her Smarts (Promo)

altTitles.ko: 시한부 아기 의원이 천재인 걸 안 숨김

altTitles.en: The Terminally-Ill Baby Doctor Doesn't Hide the Fact That She's a Genius
Terminally-Ill Baby Doctor Won't Hide Her Genius

description.en:
I woke up in my friend's favorite novel! I had limited time, but I was in a powerful body!

Just when I thought I was going back home,
I ended up stuck in this world again!

So, I made up my mind.
I don’t want to live a life of struggle!

In order to do that:
"Dad, I'll help you reclaim your memories. So help me!"

In order to survive as the greatest doctor, I need the greatest person to protect me! My dad!
Wake up, dad!

===

I signed a contract with my dad in exchange for helping him find his memories.

On the way, I helped out a girl, as well as my younger uncle.

While also saving my big uncle, and cousin.

"I'm going home!"
"No, don't go, Big sis!"
"My daughter's crying, so I forbid you from leaving."
"I'm going!"

Oh my goodness!
Everyone’s trying to make me stay.

But I’m dead set on throwing everything away and leaving!

Can I really stay away for long?

title.en: Sekai Saikyou no Majo, Hajimemashita ~Watashi Dake "Kouryaku Saito" o Miseru Sekai de Jiyuu ni Ikimasu~

altTitles.ja: 世界最強の魔女、始めました ～私だけ『攻略サイト』を見れる世界で自由に生きます～

altTitles.en: I Became the World's Strongest Witch: I Will Live Freely in a World Where Only I can Access the "Guide Site"
The World's Strongest Witch has Begun: I Will Live Freely in a World Where Only I can View the "Strategy Site"

altTitles.id: Aku Menjadi Penyihir Terkuat di Dunia: Aku Akan Hidup dengan Bebas di Dunia di Mana Hanya Aku yang Bisa Mengakses "Situs Panduan"

description.en:
An unknown skill turns into unlimited power with divine knowledge [Internet]!

"To manifest an SSS rank with the weakest skill is a disgrace!"

Rona is a girl who was expelled from her home due to her lack of money, food, and power. Lost and hopeless, she suddenly hears the words...

"Would you like some guidance?"

She discovers how to utilize her unique SSS rank skill: [Internet], which she alone possesses. The true nature of this skill is the ability to access this world's 'guide sites' - an extraordinary cheat skill! Endless production of valuable items! Acquiring ultra-rare equipment! Thanks to her skill, she can do as she pleases...!
description.ja:
「…攻略うぃき？」――最弱クラスのスキルを発現してしまい追放された少女・ローナ。しかしそのスキルの正体は、この世界の『攻略サイト』を見ることができるＳＳＳランクのチートスキル【インターネット】だった！

（１）冒険開始→（２）即・最強武器発見→（３）世界を混乱に陥れる最強少女に‥‥‥。ローナは言う。「私はただ、平和に自由に生きたいだけなのにいぃ‥‥‥！」

altTitles.en: Please Don't Come to the Villainess' Stationery Store!

altTitles.pt: Por favor, não venha para a papelaria da vilã!

altTitles.uk: Не приходьте в канцелярський магазин лиходійки!

description.en:
"A useless thing like you has no value in our family. Take this money and leave immediately!"

"Yes! Goodbye!"

She became the incompetent villainess who commits wrongdoings in order to earn the love of her fiancé, the male lead. Her reputation was already at rock bottom and the main characters, who can't live without each other, are having an affair.

"Getting kicked out and receiving money is good enough!"

So after she was kicked out, she set up a stationery store in front of a school. She reminisces of snacks, beer candy, and even bubbles! Just you wait, kids! But… somehow her young customers are a little weird?

"I'll find you a handsome and modest man, and not someone who has an affair like my brother!"

"Ha, then what about my brother, the crown prince?”

"…the tower master is the best."

The great magic swordsman, the crown prince, the villainous tower master, and finally, the hidden villain. The stationery store, which she thought would be peaceful, left her with no rest.

*Help me! I just wanted to live a normal life!*

---
What's a girl to do when she wakes up in the body of a villainess? Meldenique Babelloa is a supporting character in a romance novel starring her fiancé, Duke Lennox Hessman, and… her sister, Sheria! Heartbroken, she eventually dies a tragic death as a villainess… or so the original story goes. Determined not to follow the script, Meldenique resolutely abandons her old life and sets out to open… a stationery shop! Will she succeed in defying fate and building the stationery shop of her dreams?

---

description.fr:
«Une chose inutile comme toi n’a aucune valeur dans notre famille. Prends cet argent et pars immédiatement!»

«Oui! Au revoir!»

Elle est devenue la méchante incompétente qui commet des actes répréhensibles afin de gagner l’amour de son fiancé, le protagoniste. Sa réputation était déjà au plus bas et les personnages principaux, qui ne peuvent pas vivre l’un sans l’autre, ont une liaison.

«Se faire virer et recevoir de l’argent, c’est déjà bien!»

Ainsi, après avoir été mise à la porte, elle a ouvert une papeterie devant une école. Elle se souvient des snacks, des bonbons à la bière, et même des bulles ! Attendez, les enfants ! Mais… ses jeunes clients sont un peu bizarres?

«Je te trouverai un homme beau et modeste, et pas quelqu’un qui a une liaison comme mon frère!»

«Ha, alors qu’en est-il de mon frère, le prince héritier?»

«…le maître de la tour est le meilleur.»

Le grand épéiste magique, le prince héritier, le méchant maître de la tour, et enfin, le méchant caché. La papeterie, qu’elle pensait être paisible, ne lui laissait aucun répit. Aidez-moi! Je voulais juste vivre une vie normale!

description.ko:
남주의 약혼녀이지만, 그의 사랑을 받기 위해 악행을 저지르는 무능한 악녀에 빙의했다. 
이미 평판은 밑바닥이고, 서로 죽고 못 사는 주인공들은 저들끼리 불륜까지 막 저지르는 막장 상황. 

"너 같이 쓸모 없는 것은 우리 가문에 있을 가치가 없다. 이 돈을 받고 썩 꺼지거라!"
"네! 안녕히 계세요!" 

그래서 냉큼 돈 받고 쫓겨나 학교 앞에 추억의 문구점을 차렸다. 
추억의 쫀드기, 맥주사탕, 비눗방울 놀이까지! 어린이들 기다려! 

그런데.... 어쩐지 내 어린 고객님들이 좀 이상하다? 

"내가, 우리 오빠 같은 불륜남 말고 잘생기고 조신한 남자 찾아 줄게요!"
"헉, 그럼 황태자이신 우리 형님은 어때?" 
"....마탑주님이 최고야." 

그렇게 위대한 마검, 차기 황태자, 악역인 마탑주, 그리고 최종 흑막까지 엮이게 되면서 
평화로울 줄만 알았던 문구점에는 하루도 바람 잘 날이 없는데. 

살려줘! 난 그냥 평범하게 살고 싶었을 뿐이라고!

description.pt:
O que uma garota deve fazer quando acorda no corpo de uma vilã? Meldenique Babelloa é uma personagem coadjuvante em um romance estrelado por seu noivo, o duque Lennox Hessman, e… sua irmã, Sheria! Com o coração partido, ela eventualmente morre uma morte trágica como uma vilã… ou assim diz a história original. Determinada a não seguir o roteiro, Meldenique abandona resolutamente sua antiga vida e se propõe a abrir... uma papelaria! Será que ela conseguirá desafiar o destino e construir a papelaria dos seus sonhos?

description.ru:
"Такая бесполезная вещь, как ты, не имеет ценности в нашей семье. Возьми эти деньги и немедленно уходи!"
 "Хорошо! Прощай!"
Она стала некомпетентной злодейкой, которая совершает проступки, чтобы заслужить любовь своего жениха, главного героя.
Её репутация уже была на дне, и главные герои, которые не могут жить друг без друга, заводят роман.
" Быть выгнанным и получать деньги - это хорошо!"
Поэтому после того, как её выгнали, она открыла магазин канцелярских товаров перед школой. Она продаёт закуски, пивные конфеты и даже пузыри! Погодите, детки!
Но… почему-то её молодые клиенты немного странные?
"Я найду тебе красивого и скромного мужчину, а не такого , у которого есть роман, как у моего брата!"
"Ха, а что насчет моего брата, крон-принца?"
"… мастер башни - лучший. *
Великий магический фехтовальщик, следующий кронпринц, злодейский хозяин башни и, наконец, скрытый злодей.
Магазин канцелярских товаров, который, как она думала, будет мирным, не оставлял ей покоя.
Помогите мне! Я просто хотела жить нормальной жизнью!

description.uk:
— Ти ганьбиш ім'я нашої родини. Забирай ці гроші та вали звідси!
-Чудово! Бувай!

Вона прийшла до тями ні на що не здатною злодійкою, яка творила зло, щоб завоювати любов її нареченого, головного героя.

Її репутація і так була на дні, а головні герої, які не можуть жити один без одного, закрутили роман.
-Мене хоч і виперли, але дали гроші - вже непогано!

Після того, як її вигнали з дому, вона відкрила перший магазин канцелярських товарів перед школою. Крім іншого, там продаються закуски, солодощі та навіть жуйка! Ну, дітлахи, тримайтеся!
Але... Чому її юні клієнти такі дивні?

-Я знайду тобі гарного і скромного хлопця, а не дурня, що ходить ліворуч, як мій брат!
-Ха, а як щодо мого брата, наслідного принца?
—Господар Башти просто найкращий.

Великий магічний воїн, королівський принц, жахливий власник вежі та таємничий лиходій.

Мирне життя, яке вона хотіла від магазину канцелярії, обернулася зовсім інакше.
Допоможіть! Я просто хотіла жити нормальним життям!

description.vi:
“Một thứ vô dụng như mày không xứng đáng ở trong gia đình này. Cầm lấy số tiền này và cút đi!” “Được rồi! Tạm biệt!” Cô trở thành một nhân vật phản diện bất tài, thực hiện những hành vi sai trái để giành được tình yêu của vị hôn phu của mình, nam chính. Danh tiếng của cô đã xuống đáy và các nhân vật chính, những người vốn không thể sống thiếu nhau, đang có quan hệ tình cảm với nhau. “Bị đuổi ra ngoài mà được nhận tiền là quá tốt rồi!” Vì vậy, sau khi cô ấy bị đuổi ra khỏi nhà, cô ấy đã mở một cửa hàng văn phòng phẩm ở phía trước của một trường học. Cô ấy hồi tưởng lại về đồ ăn nhẹ, kẹo bia, và thậm chí cả chơi với bong bóng xà phòng! Các em chỉ cần chờ thôi, mấy nhóc à! Nhưng… Không hiểu sao những khách hàng trẻ tuổi của cô lại có chút kỳ lạ? “Em sẽ tìm cho chị một chàng trai đẹp mã và khiêm tốn, và cả chưa từng yêu ai như anh trai em chẳng hạn!” “Ha, vậy còn anh trai em, hoàng thái tử thì sao?” “… Chủ tháp là tuyệt nhất. ” Kiếm sĩ ma thuật vĩ đại, tiếp đó là hoàng thái tử, chủ nhân của tòa tháp tàn độc và cuối cùng là nhân vật phản diện giấu mặt. Cửa hàng văn phòng phẩm mà cô tưởng chừng sẽ yên bình lại khiến cô không nghỉ ngơi được.

description.zh:
“像你这样没用的东西在我们家毫无价值，拿上这笔钱，马上离开!”

“是的!再见!”

她成为了一个无能的女反派，为了赢得她的未婚夫——男主角的爱，她做了很多错事。她的名声已经跌到谷底，而主角们，不能离开彼此，却有了外遇。

“被踢出去收钱就够了!”

在她被赶出来后，她在一所学校前开了一家文具店。她回忆起零食，啤酒糖果，甚至泡泡!孩子们，等着瞧吧!

但不知怎的，她的年轻顾客有点奇怪?

“我会给你找个英俊而谦虚的男人，而不是像我哥哥那样有外遇的人!”

“哈，那我的哥哥太子呢?”

“……塔的主人是最好的。”

伟大的神剑手，下一任王储，恶毒的塔主，隐藏的恶棍。

她本以为她的文具店会很安静，但现在却让她无法休息。

帮帮我!我只想过正常的生活!

description.zh-hk:
她附身在了雖是男主的未婚妻，但卻為了得到男主的愛而做下惡行的無能惡女身上。

風評已經到底了，還身處沒有彼此不能活的主角之間出軌的狗血狀況。

“像你這樣沒用的東西待在我們家族沒有任何價值。拿著這些錢滾吧！” “是！再見！” 所以立刻拿了錢被趕出去，在學校門前開了一家記憶中的文具店。

回憶中的橡皮糖，啤酒糖，再到吹肥皂泡泡！小孩子們等著吧！但是... 我的小客人怎麼有點兒奇怪？

“我，不要我哥哥那樣的出軌男，給你找長得帥的正經男人！” “嗬，那麼我哥哥皇太子怎麼樣？” “.…魔法塔主是最棒的。”

就那樣偉大的魔劍，下一任皇太子，反派魔法塔主，還被牽扯到最終的黑幕之中，本以為很平和的文具店沒有一天風平浪靜。

救救我！我只是想過平凡的生活！

altTitles.ja: バトルスタディーズ

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

title.en: Kyou mo E ni Kaita Mochi ga Umai

altTitles.ja: 今日も絵に描いた餅が美味い@COMIC

altTitles.en: The Mochi I Drew Is Tasty Today Too

altTitles.zh: 今天画出来的年糕也很美味

description.en: Tougo is a high school student who loves drawing more than anything. One day, he woke up in a deep forest filled with vegetations he had never seen before... While he went on an exploration finding answers in this new world, he found them without putting much effort. When he drew a Mochi using pencil and paper, something unusual happened...?! Not just a log house but legendary beasts too?! With ability to bring anything into being, he creates a paradise for everyone! A young boy who unbeknownst to him is loved by others.
description.ja:
描いた絵を何でもポンッと出せる力――
絵を描くのが大好きな高校生・トウゴの日常は「異世界」で魔法の力を手に入れて一変した！肉や泉、ログハウス等をどんどん実体化して楽しむばかりか、何故かふかふかの怪鳥やユニコーンにペガサスまで集まってきて、にぎやかな“ふわ森ライフ”が始まったのだ。だが、そんな皆のオアシスに不穏な影が忍び寄っていて……？餅からドラゴンまで!?　何でも生み出して、作ろう皆のパラダイス！
description.pt-br:
Tougo é um estudante do ensino médio que adora desenhar mais do que qualquer coisa. Um dia, ele acordou em uma floresta profunda cheia de vegetação que ele nunca tinha visto antes...
Enquanto ele ia em uma exploração para encontrar respostas neste novo mundo, ele as encontrou sem colocar muito esforço.
Quando ele desenhou um Mochi usando lápis e papel, algo incomum aconteceu...?! O Mochi surgiu na frente dele!

Com a capacidade de trazer qualquer coisa à existência, ele cria um paraíso para todos!
Um menino que, sem que ele saiba, é amado por todos ao seu redor.

A história de fantasia de um desenhista começa aqui!

altTitles.ja: あかね噺

description.en:
Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. 
Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical Japanese entertainment. 
Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane takes her own steps into this unique world!
description.fr:
Shinta s'est perfectionné 13 ans durant afin d'atteindre le statut de Shin'uchi, le plus haut rang des rakugo-ka. Mais malgré sa très bonne performance lors de l'examen de passage, le juge de l'épreuve, l'émérite Maître Arakawa Issho, a décidé de renvoyer de l'école Arakawa l'ensemble des participants sans donner davantage d'explication ! Ainsi s'arrêta nette la carrière de Shinta, qui avait tant sacrifié pour accomplir son rêve…
Mais Akane, la fille de Shinta qui admirait son père et son rakugo plus que tout, ne compte pas en rester là !
description.th:
ที่สุดแห่งศิลปะการเล่าเรื่องที่ใช้ผู้แสดงเพียงหนึ่งคนและเรื่องเล่าเพียงหนึ่งเรื่อง --- "ราคุโกะ" นักราคุโกะ อาราคาวะ ชินตะและอาคาเนะลูกสาวของเขาต่างก็หลงเสน่ห์ของความบันเทิงอันสุดแสนจะเรียบง่ายนี้ ในวันที่ชินตะขึ้นเวทีแสดงในการสอบเลื่อนชั้นเป็นชินอุจิ อาคาเนะเองก็ได้ชมการแสดงนั้นอยู่และเส้นทางของนักราคุโกะที่อาคาเนะตัดสินใจก้าวเดินไปก็คือ---- มังงะราคุโกะขนานแท้ที่เหล่านักราคุโกะล้วนมาประชันฝีมือฟาดฟันกันได้เปิดฉากขึ้นแล้ว!

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br:
Rakugo - a forma perfeita de contar histórias, na qual tudo é expresso apenas com seu corpo e palavras. 
Shinta e sua filha, Akane, foram seduzidos por essa maravilhosa forma clássica de entretenimento. 
Observando seu pai treinar para passar no teste de Shin’uchi, Akane avança neste mundo único.

altTitles.ja: ウィッチ ウォッチ

description.en: Morihito, a boy with the strength of an ogre, is about to start living together with his childhood friend Niko, who is training to be a witch. Niko's magic leads to all sorts of unpredictable trouble, and with two teens under one roof… Let the fantastical antics begin! Magical comedy series by Kenta Shinohara creator of SKET DANCE and Astra Lost in Space.
description.ne:
निको वाकात्सुकीले आफ्नो छ वर्षको बोक्सीको तालिम पूरा गरिसकेकी छिन् र उनी आफैं सहरमा सर्दैछिन्। नयाँ बोक्सीको रूपमा, उसले आफ्नो साथ दिनको लागि परिचित छनोट गर्नुपर्छ। यद्यपि, अन्य बोक्सीहरू भन्दा फरक, उनी गैर-जन्तु परिचित छान्न चाहन्छिन्। मोरिहितो "मोई" ओतोगी भन्दा राम्रो साथी कोही छैन - उनको बाल्यकालको साथी जो एक औघ राक्षस हुन्। मोरिहितो उनको नोकर हुनुको कडा विरोध गर्छन्, तर उनले बोक्सीको आदेशको अवज्ञा गरेमा श्रापले उनलाई अनौठो गाई-बाघ हाइब्रिडमा फर्काउनेछ भनेर थाहा पाएपछि उनले आफ्नो भाग्यलाई अनिच्छुकतासाथ स्वीकार गर्छन्।

मोरिहितोका बुबा व्यवसायिक यात्राको लागि जानुभएको कारण र निकोकी आमा बोक्शीहरुको पवित्र भूमिमा पछाडि रहनुभएको कारण, दुई किशोरहरूले आफूलाई एउटै छानामुनि सँगै बसेको भेट्टाए। जबकि निको आफ्नो क्रशसँग बाँच्न पाउँदा उत्साहित छिन्, मोरिहितोले पत्ता लगाए कि उनको जादुई गतिविधि र समग्र अनाड़ीपनले समाधान भन्दा बढी समस्याहरू सिर्जना गर्छ। एक वर्ष भित्र निकोमा आउने भविष्यवाणी गरिएको प्रकोपको साथ, मोरिहितोले आफ्नो अंगरक्षकको रूपमा रक्षा गर्नको लागि सक्दो गर्नुपर्दछ र साथै आफ्नो परिचितको रूपमा आफ्नो कर्तव्यहरू पालना गर्नुपर्नेछ।
description.pt: Morihito, um menino com a força de um ogro, está prestes a começar a viver com sua amiga de infância, Niko, que está treinando para ser feiticeira. A magia de Niko os leva a todos os tipos de problemas imprevisíveis, e com dois adolescentes sob o mesmo teto… Que as travessuras fantásticas comecem! Uma série de comédia de magia de Kenta Shinohara, criador de SKET DANCE e Astra Perdido no Espaço.
description.ru:
Морихито, парень с демонической силой, начинает жить вместе со своей подругой детства Нико, которая учится быть ведьмой. Магия Нико приводит ко всяким непредсказуемым проблемам, а уж когда два подростка остаются под одной крышей… да начнутся фантастические выходки!  
Магический комедийный сериал от Кенты Синохары, автора «SKET DANCE» и «Астра, затерянная в космосе».
description.uk:
Моріхіто, хлопець з силою оні, ось-ось почне жити разом зі своєю подругою дитинства Ніко, яка навчається на відьму. Магія Ніко призводить до всіляких непередбачуваних неприємностей, а коли двоє підлітків живуть під одним дахом... Фантастичні витівки починаються!
Магічний комедійний серіал від Кента Шінохари, творця “SKET DANCE” та "Загублена в космосі Астра".

title.en: Dorei Senshi no Isekai Taneuma Seikatsu ~Mahou mo Bujutsu mo Saikyou Dashi Harem made!?~

altTitles.id: Kehidupan Budak Petarung Seks di Dunia lain

altTitles.ja: 奴隷戦士の異世界種馬生活 ～魔法も武術も最強だしハーレムまで！？～

altTitles.en: A Slave Warrior's Stallion Life in Another World - Both Magic and Martial Arts are the Strongest, and Even a Harem!?

description.en:
"Ryuu" is a former modern human reincarnated in another world. He is a slave in this new world. However, once the knowledge of his previous life was revived, his magic power is also awakened. He gained strength at a speed that was incomparable to other slaves, and he easily defeated strong opponents, becoming the strongest gladiator among slaves.

Ryuu is bought by the noble Juller. The Juller Family, who saw slaves as power, wanted to own a great slave. The first instruction given to Ryuu as a slave was to "seed" a beautiful female slave...!

I'm a Slaves but super free! This otherworldly fantasy, which starts from the lowest class but has an unlimited future, start with a BANG!
description.id: "Ryuu", mantan manusia modern yang bereinkarnasi di dunia lain. Dia adalah seorang budak di dunia ini. Namun, begitu pengetahuan tentang kehidupan sebelumnya dihidupkan kembali, kekuatan sihirnya juga ikut terbangun. Dia mendapatkan kekuatan dengan kecepatan yang tidak bisa dibandingkan dengan budak lain, dan dia dengan mudah mengalahkan lawan yang kuat, dan menjadi seorang gladiator terkuat di antara para budak. Saat itu, seseorang yang membeli Ryuu muncul. Dia adalah bangsawan Juller, Keluarga Juller, yang melihat budak sebagai kekuatan, ingin memiliki budak yang hebat. Dan instruksi pertama yang diberikan kepada Ryuu sebagai seorang budak adalah untuk "membenihi" seorang budak wanita yang cantik...!
description.ja:
異世界に転生した、元現代人の“リュー”。彼はこの世界では奴隷の身分だった。しかし前世の知識が蘇ったと同時に彼の魔力は覚醒する。他の奴隷とは比べものにならない速さで実力をつけ、いとも簡単に強敵を倒していく彼は、奴隷の中で剣闘士の道を駆け上がっていく。
そんなある時、リューを購入する者が現れた。それは、大貴族で名門のジュラー家。奴隷を力と見なすジュラー家には、優秀な奴隷を揃えたい考えがあった。
そして、リューに奴隷として下された最初の指示は、なんと美しい女奴隷への“種付け”だった……！
奴隷なのに超自由！？　最下層から始まるけど未来は無限大な異世界ファンタジー、堂々開幕！

altTitles.ja: 虚の記憶
虚（から）の記憶

description.en:
Between a recent move to Tokyo and the first day of high school, Rei starts his day filled with anxiety and insecurity. His nervousness accompanies him to the classroom, where amidst the classroom chatter, Rei is suddenly struck with a strange dream, followed by an aching in his chest.  
  
Once he wakes up, Rei is greeted by a small creature standing on his desk. Passing it off as part of his dream, Rei heads home. However, to his surprise, numerous other strange creatures of all shapes and sizes roam the streets, seemingly invisible to everyone else.  
  
With countless questions and the small creature from before trailing behind him, Rei's life is changed forever when he encounters a tall one-eyed figure, dressed in all black, smiling at him.
___
**Note:** This manga is based on the song of the same name.

title.en: TS Akuyaku Reijou Kamisama Tensei Zen'nin Tsuihou Haishin RTA ~Kiraware Tsuihou End o Mezashiteru no ni Saikyou Musou Road kara Orirarenai~

altTitles.ja: TS悪役令嬢神様転生善人追放配信RTA～嫌われ追放エンドを目指してるのに最強無双ロードから降りられない～

altTitles.en: TS Villainess RTA (Time-Split Villianess Real-Time Attack)

description.en:
A man who lost his life in an accident is reincarnated into an otome game world with a mission given by gods who want entertainment. And the background story in the game is that she is incarnated as a villain princess character, which turns out to be a good person but she is instead exiled after that the game will be speedrun and streamed!? He was told the sooner he was exiled the more benefits he would get in the next life, along with the start of the game he invited all the characters to fight so he could be exiled quickly, but instead, he was invincible and became a popular person... !?

Respected by the original protagonist, a handsome aristocrat makes the main character his goal and he is trained by a cheat class, in the end, this otome game deviates from the original story too!! She's gradually getting ready to get the ending of being exiled, but the event of death always comes to her….. as the daughter of a marquis “marianne biesround” who is fighting for her next life, she will destroy all those who stand in her way (and blow them away) with magic. strongest, “meteor”! The manga adaptation of the violent webnovel otome game has begun!!!
description.id:
Soerang pria yang kehilangan nyawanya dalam sebuah kecelakaan bereinkarnasi kedunia otome game dengan misi yang di berikan oleh para dewa yang menginginkan hiburan. Dan latar cerita dalam game nya adalah ia berinkarnasi sebagai seorang karakter putri villain , yang ternyata merupakan orang baik tapi dia malah di asingkan setelah itu game nya akan di speedrun dan streaming!? Dia di beritahu semakin cepat dia di asingkan semakin banyak pula keuntungan yang akan dia dapatkan di kehidupan selanjutnya, bersamaan dengan di mulainya game dia mengajak bertarung semua karakter yang ada agar dia dapat cepat di asingkan, namun dia malah tidak terkalahkan dan menjadi orang yang populer…!?

Di hormati oleh protagonis original, seorang bangsawan tampan menjadikan pemeran utama sebagai tujuannya dan dia di latih oleh seorang cheat class, pada akhirnya otome game inipun jadi melenceng dari cerita aslinya!! Dia secara bertahap bersiap-siap untuk mendapatkan ending di asingkan, akan tetapi event kematian selalu datang menghampirinya….. sebagai putri dari seorang marquis “marianne biesround” yang berjuang demi kehidupan selanjutnya, dia akan menghancurkan semua orang yang menghalanginya  (dan menghempaskannya) dengan sihir terkuat, “meteor”! adaptasi manga dari webnovel otome game yang penuh dengan kekerasan telah di mulai!!!
description.ja: 「乙女ゲームの悪役令嬢にTS転生して追放されるRTA配信をしてもらう」「なんて？？」ふとした事故で命を落とした男は、神々の手により乙女ゲームの世界に転生させられることに。その使命は「乙女ゲームの悪役令嬢としてTS転生し、実は善人なのに追放されるまでのタイムアタックを配信」!?早く追放されるほど次の人生に特典が用意されると聞き、オープニングで登場人物に喧嘩を売って追放されようとするが、何故か逆に人気者に…!?遠のいていく追放フラグに大苦戦!?

altTitles.ja: 僕は婚約破棄なんてしませんからね

Boku ha Kon'yaku Haki Nante Shimasen kara ne

altTitles.en: I'm Not Breaking Off The Engagement
I Won't Be Breaking Off This Engagement. You Know That, Right?

altTitles.ko: 나는 약혼 파기 따위 하지 않을 거예요

description.en:
"Ah… Ahhhhhhhhhhh!"  
  
The one who's become the Crown Prince's fiancée is the Duke's daughter Serea, but during their first meeting, she screamed and collapsed! Had she remembered something from her previous life? Are you an evil villainess? Am I going to break you if I fool around too much? A me that's programmed to be like that, is so horrible. Isn't that right~ An "event" and those "program settings" have no connection to me though. Let's go back to my place and I'll slowly and sweetly make you fall desperately in love with me!  
  
This otome game's villainess is going to follow a harsh path, and will fight to change her fate.
___
**Character Designer:** [Nardack](https://mangadex.org/author/f27853e1-c9b2-442a-a8f8-ca3962078222)

altTitles.ja: 夢なし先生の進路指導

description.en: A former career consultant, Takanashi now works for a school as a Guidance Counselor. During career guidance meetings, he gives headstrong students data and tells them the realities of the world around them, hoping that they rethink their dreams. Because of that, students call him “Yumenashi-sensei” (“Dreamless-sensei”/“Dream Crusher–sensei”).
description.ja: 元キャリアコンサルタントの高校教師・高梨（たかなし）は、生徒から「夢なし先生」と呼ばれている。彼は進路指導時、生徒の「夢」に対し現実的なデータや世の中の実情を突きつけ、否定し、覚悟を問う。それでも夢を追い、のちに夢破れ、どん底の中でも諦めきれない生徒がいれば、卒業後でも手を差し伸べ、「諦めるための授業」を行うのだった。

description.en:
Following a momentous battle against giants for the fate of the world, Ronan emerges victorious as the last man standing of the Imperial Army. As he laments this hollow victory with his dying commander, Grand Marshal Adeshan, they quickly learn that the war is far from over and an overwhelming force of giants descends from the heavens.

Fearing the worst, yet seeing hope in the courageous Ronan, Adeshan uses her last time slip to send him back to the past, so that he can enroll in the prestigious Phileon Academy and become the strongest swordsman the empire has ever seen!

title.en: Akuyaku Onzoushi no Kanchigai Seija Seikatsu - Nidome no Jinsei wa Yaritai Houdai Shitai Dake na no ni

altTitles.ja: 悪役御曹司の勘違い聖者生活～二度目の人生はやりたい放題したいだけなのに～

altTitles.ja-ro: Akuyaku Onzoushi no Kanchigai Seija Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: 悪役御曹司の勘違い聖者生活

altTitles.en: The Misunderstood Saintly Life of a Villainous Scion ~ I just want to do whatever I want in my second life~

description.en:
Ouga Vellet, the eldest son of the infamous corrupt lordly Vellet family, is a reincarnator. Having been taken advantage of due to his kindness in his past life, he now revels in the life of a mischievous villainous heir. From then on, Ouga spared no compromise, pushing the limits of "tyranny" to achieve his ambitions.

"Wow, Ouga-sama, you're amazing!"

...Just for "arrogant behavior," his reputation seems to soar without his control? The curtain rises on a life of misconceptions and misconceived saintliness!
description.ja:
悪徳領主として名高いヴェレット家の長男―オウガ・ヴェレットは転生者である。人の良さから前世で割を食ってばかりだった彼は、これを機にやりたい放題の悪役御曹司ライフを謳歌するため横暴の限りを尽くすはずが―


「さすがです！　オウガ様！」

……『傍若無人な振る舞い』をしてるだけなのに、なぜか周囲からの評価が瞬く間に上がっていき――⁉悪役御曹司の勘違いの勘違い聖者生活、開幕！

altTitles.ja: 今宵あなたとひたむき淫ら

altTitles.en: ‏ tonight with intense passion and fearless desire by your side

description.en:
Anzu Yagihashi is in deep pain after her colleague stole her ex-boyfriend. As if this wound wasn’t enough, she receives an invitation to their wedding, amplifying her suffering and making the pitying and judgmental gazes around her cut even deeper into her heart.

On her way back from the wedding, she comes across a handsome bartender named Kyohei standing in front of a shop. His charming personality and warm words soothe her broken heart. However, over time, she finds herself confused by his overwhelming kindness, as if their connection might go beyond simple comfort.

Despite her growing attraction to him, Anzu realizes that Kyohei isn’t an ordinary man. He’s dangerous, and if she allows herself to be drawn into his emotions, she might find herself unable to escape.
